column4: Hii all, can I setup a server on my home machine?? I am running Gutsy
what sort of server
LAMP, I want to run my personal blog frm my Desktop
What??
point is that I dont have domain name registered
use a dynamic dns service
i use dyndns.com
XiXaQ: or .org rather :P
you need to set up dynamic dns on your router and register a domain name at the website
I did not get u
have you set up a domain on the website?
Where should I do it??
dyndns.org
yeah done
k now does your router support dynamic dns?
yeah it does
k so set that up with your username and password
where in the modem??
does it have a web interface?
yeah, it does, its D-Link 502T router
oh ya got it
I will enter the password and usernam just a min
ive gtg hope you get it sorted
ok fine will meet you some other time
